thread.title: Bernie Sanders Becomes Powerful Later, Against The Right..
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders Becomes Powerful Later, Against The Right..

author: Divergent
title: Bernie Sanders Becomes Powerful Later, Against The Right..
text: Bernie Sanders Becomes Powerful Later, Against The Right.. I haven't seen tonight's debate so I'm saying this without influence. Bernie Sanders can debate the Left, but most of the time, the Left will argue like a Married Couple. Not like the Right Wing who argues like everyone is stupid except for themselves. Selfish perspective. Bernie will gain ground once he debates TRUMP and other super-capitalists. The magic behind Bernie is NUMBERS/FACTUAL CALCULATIONS . America is sick of BS politicians saying the other person is stupid and getting into office on insults alone. Bernie might have a few insults, but his move is FACTUAL BASED. Politicians turned into negative political adds. America is voting AGAINST the worse opponent...instead of FOR the better one.... Last debate the Right Wing said, "We will not be DICTATED by fact checkers".... Facts are a dictatorship? lol The evolution is here and this Forum needs to catch up. Insulting someone does not make you a bigger or better person. Insulting someone without intelligence makes us look at the one insulting instead of the *point the finger and they will never figure out I'm a fraud* of days past. Bernie might lose to Hillary. Party people decide before debates. But everyone will feel and remember the Bern...
